statements: SELECT * FROM irrigation_needs
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, moisture_reading FROM irrigation_needs
SELECT * FROM irrigation_needs WHERE soil_type = 'Clay'
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp FROM irrigation_needs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(moisture_reading) AS average_moisture FROM irrigation_needs
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, soil_type, moisture_reading, timestamp FROM irrigation_needs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY moisture_reading DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM irrigation_needs WHERE soil_type = 'Clay'
SELECT sensor_name, moisture_reading FROM irrigation_needs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-05-01' AND moisture_reading < 0.5
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS readings_count FROM irrigation_needs GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY readings_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT soil_type FROM irrigation_needs
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY sensor_location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data INNER JOIN irrigation_needs ON soil_moisture_data.sensor_id = irrigation_needs.plant_id;
SELECT sensor_location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Garden%';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT plant_name, irrigation_amount FROM irrigation_needs WHERE irrigation_amount >= 10 ORDER BY plant_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data INNER JOIN irrigation_needs ON soil_moisture_data.sensor_id = irrigation_needs.plant_id WHERE soil_moisture_data.moisture_level < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureReadings;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureReadings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureReadings WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureReadings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureReadings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureReadings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureReadings WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM SoilSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Type A' ORDER BY sensor_location;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureReadings INNER JOIN IrrigationNeeds ON SoilMoistureReadings.sensor_id = IrrigationNeeds.sensor_id WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureReadings LEFT JOIN SoilSensors ON SoilMoistureReadings.sensor_id = SoilSensors.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Irrigation_Zones;
SELECT zone_name, moisture_threshold FROM Irrigation_Zones ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_status FROM Soil_Sensors WHERE sensor_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Moisture_Readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT zone_id, start_time, duration FROM Irrigation_Schedule WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT * FROM Irrigation_Zones
SELECT zone_id, zone_name FROM Irrigation_Zones WHERE moisture_threshold > 0.5
SELECT zone_id, zone_name FROM Irrigation_Zones ORDER BY zone_name DESC
SELECT Soil_Sensors.sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_status, reading_time, moisture_level FROM Soil_Sensors JOIN Moisture_Readings ON Soil_Sensors.sensor_id = Moisture_Readings.sensor_id
SELECT zone_name, start_time, duration FROM Irrigation_Zones JOIN Irrigation_Schedule ON Irrigation_Zones.zone_id = Irrigation_Schedule.zone_id
SELECT * FROM SoilSensorData;
SELECT sensor_location, moisture_reading FROM SoilSensorData WHERE moisture_reading > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, timestamp FROM SoilSensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT humidity, timestamp FROM WeatherData ORDER BY humidity ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, moisture_reading, timestamp FROM SoilSensorData WHERE moisture_reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND humidity > 70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT schedule_id, irrigation_zone, start_time, end_time FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE irrigation_zone = 'Zone A' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT history_id, irrigation_zone, start_time, end_time, water_amount FROM IrrigationHistory WHERE start_time >= '2023-01-01' AND end_time <= '2023-01-31' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT settings_id, irrigation_zone, threshold_moisture, max_watering_time FROM IrrigationSettings WHERE threshold_moisture < 20 OR max_watering_time = INTERVAL '1 hour' ORDER BY threshold_moisture ASC LIMIT 5;
